snippet: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr., who has stayed out of public view while undergoing treatment for bipolar disorder, is being investigated for the possible misuse of campaign money.
abstract: Rep Jesse L Jackson Jr is being investigated for possible misuse of campaign money in his reelection bid for Congress; Jackson has stayed out of public view while undergoing treatment for bipolar disorder; inquiry by the Washington field office of Federal Bureau of Investigation is said to have begun before Jackson went on medical leave.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and MONICA DAVEY

lead_paragraph: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr., who has stayed out of public view while undergoing treatment for bipolar disorder, is being investigated for the possible misuse of campaign money.

headline.seo: Jesse Jackson Jr. Investigated Over Campaign Financing
headline.main: Jackson Is Investigated Over Money in Campaign
headline.print_headline: Congressman Investigated Over Money In Campaign
